verses.verse: And Israel <S%H3478><s%> took his journey <S%H5265><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> he had, and came <S%H935><s%> to Beer-sheba, <S%H884><s%> and offered <S%H2076><s%> sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> unto the God <S%H430><s%> of his father <S%H1><s%> Isaac. <S%H3327><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> unto Israel <S%H3478><s%> in the visions <S%H4759><s%> of the night, <S%H3915><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> Jacob. <S%H3290><s%> And he said, <S%H559><s%> Here <S%H2009><s%> am I.

And he said, <S%H559><s%> I <S%H595><s%> am God, <S%H410><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of thy father: <S%H1><s%> fear <S%H3372><s%> not <S%H408><s%> to go down <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3381><s%> into Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I will there <S%H8033><s%> make <S%H7760><s%> of thee a great <S%H1419><s%> nation: <S%H1471><s%>

I <S%H595><s%> will go down <S%H3381><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> thee into Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> and I <S%H595><s%> will also <S%H1571><s%> surely bring thee up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H5927><s%> again: and Joseph <S%H3130><s%> shall put <S%H7896><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> thine eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> from Beer-sheba: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H884><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> carried <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> their father, <S%H1><s%> and their little ones, <S%H2945><s%> and their wives, <S%H802><s%> in the wagons <S%H5699><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> had sent <S%H7971><s%> to carry <S%H5375><s%> him.

And they took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> their cattle, <S%H4735><s%> and their goods, <S%H7399><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they had gotten <S%H7408><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> into Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his seed <S%H2233><s%> with <S%H854><s%> him:

His sons, <S%H1121><s%> and his sons' <S%H1121><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> with <S%H854><s%> him, his daughters, <S%H1323><s%> and his sons' <S%H1121><s%> daughters, <S%H1323><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his seed <S%H2233><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> he with <S%H854><s%> him into Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And these <S%H428><s%> are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> which came <S%H935><s%> into Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> and his sons: <S%H1121><s%> Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> Jacob's <S%H3290><s%> firstborn. <S%H1060><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben; <S%H7205><s%> Hanoch, <S%H2585><s%> and Phallu, <S%H6396><s%> and Hezron, <S%H2696><s%> and Carmi. <S%H3756><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon; <S%H8095><s%> Jemuel, <S%H3223><s%> and Jamin, <S%H3226><s%> and Ohad, <S%H161><s%> and Jachin, <S%H3199><s%> and Zohar, <S%H6714><s%> and Shaul <S%H7586><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of a Canaanitish woman. <S%H3669><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi; <S%H3878><s%> Gershon, <S%H1648><s%> Kohath, <S%H6955><s%> and Merari. <S%H4847><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah; <S%H3063><s%> Er, <S%H6147><s%> and Onan, <S%H209><s%> and Shelah, <S%H7956><s%> and Pharez, <S%H6557><s%> and Zerah: <S%H2226><s%> but Er <S%H6147><s%> and Onan <S%H209><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan. <S%H3667><s%> And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Pharez <S%H6557><s%> were <S%H1961><s%> Hezron <S%H2696><s%> and Hamul. <S%H2538><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Issachar; <S%H3485><s%> Tola, <S%H8439><s%> and Phuvah, <S%H6312><s%> and Job, <S%H3102><s%> and Shimron. <S%H8110><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zebulun; <S%H2074><s%> Sered, <S%H5624><s%> and Elon, <S%H356><s%> and Jahleel. <S%H3177><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> be the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Leah, <S%H3812><s%> which <S%H834><s%> she bore <S%H3205><s%> unto Jacob <S%H3290><s%> in Padan-aram, <S%H6307><s%> with <S%H854><s%> his daughter <S%H1323><s%> Dinah: <S%H1783><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the souls <S%H5315><s%> of his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his daughters <S%H1323><s%> were thirty <S%H7970><s%> and three. <S%H7969><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad; <S%H1410><s%> Ziphion, <S%H6837><s%> and Haggi, <S%H2291><s%> Shuni, <S%H7764><s%> and Ezbon, <S%H675><s%> Eri, <S%H6179><s%> and Arodi, <S%H722><s%> and Areli. <S%H692><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Asher; <S%H836><s%> Jimnah, <S%H3232><s%> and Ishuah, <S%H3438><s%> and Isui, <S%H3440><s%> and Beriah, <S%H1283><s%> and Serah <S%H8294><s%> their sister: <S%H269><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Beriah; <S%H1283><s%> Heber, <S%H2268><s%> and Malchiel. <S%H4439><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zilpah, <S%H2153><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> Laban <S%H3837><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> to Leah <S%H3812><s%> his daughter, <S%H1323><s%> and <S%H853><s%> these <S%H428><s%> she bore <S%H3205><s%> unto Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> even sixteen <S%H8337><s%> <S%H6240><s%> souls. <S%H5315><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Rachel <S%H7354><s%> Jacob's <S%H3290><s%> wife; <S%H802><s%> Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> and Benjamin. <S%H1144><s%>

And unto Joseph <S%H3130><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> were born <S%H3205><s%> <S%H853><s%> Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> and Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Asenath <S%H621><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Poti-pherah <S%H6319><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%> of On <S%H204><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> unto him.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> were Belah, <S%H1106><s%> and Becher, <S%H1071><s%> and Ashbel, <S%H788><s%> Gera, <S%H1617><s%> and Naaman, <S%H5283><s%> Ehi, <S%H278><s%> and Rosh, <S%H7220><s%> Muppim, <S%H4649><s%> and Huppim, <S%H2650><s%> and Ard. <S%H714><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Rachel, <S%H7354><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were born <S%H3205><s%> to Jacob: <S%H3290><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the souls <S%H5315><s%> were fourteen. <S%H702><s%> <S%H6240><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Dan; <S%H1835><s%> Hushim. <S%H2366><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Naphtali; <S%H5321><s%> Jahzeel, <S%H3183><s%> and Guni, <S%H1476><s%> and Jezer, <S%H3337><s%> and Shillem. <S%H8006><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bilhah, <S%H1090><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Laban <S%H3837><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> unto Rachel <S%H7354><s%> his daughter, <S%H1323><s%> and she bore <S%H3205><s%> <S%H853><s%> these <S%H428><s%> unto Jacob: <S%H3290><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the souls <S%H5315><s%> were seven. <S%H7651><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the souls <S%H5315><s%> that came <S%H935><s%> with Jacob <S%H3290><s%> into Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> which came out <S%H3318><s%> of his loins, <S%H3409><s%> besides <S%H4480><s%> <S%H905><s%> Jacob's <S%H3290><s%> sons' <S%H1121><s%> wives, <S%H802><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the souls <S%H5315><s%> were threescore <S%H8346><s%> and six; <S%H8337><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were born <S%H3205><s%> him in Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> were two <S%H8147><s%> souls: <S%H5315><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the souls <S%H5315><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> which came <S%H935><s%> into Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> were threescore and ten. <S%H7657><s%>

And he sent <S%H7971><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him unto <S%H413><s%> Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> to direct <S%H3384><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> unto Goshen; <S%H1657><s%> and they came <S%H935><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of Goshen. <S%H1657><s%>

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> made ready <S%H631><s%> his chariot, <S%H4818><s%> and went up <S%H5927><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> his father, <S%H1><s%> to Goshen, <S%H1657><s%> and presented himself <S%H7200><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him; and he fell <S%H5307><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> his neck, <S%H6677><s%> and wept <S%H1058><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> his neck <S%H6677><s%> a good while. <S%H5750><s%>

And Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> Now <S%H6471><s%> let me die, <S%H4191><s%> since <S%H310><s%> I have seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy face, <S%H6440><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> thou art yet <S%H5750><s%> alive. <S%H2416><s%>

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> his brethren, <S%H251><s%> and unto <S%H413><s%> his father's <S%H1><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> I will go up, <S%H5927><s%> and show <S%H5046><s%> Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, My brethren, <S%H251><s%> and my father's <S%H1><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> are come <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me;

And the men <S%H376><s%> are shepherds, <S%H7462><s%> <S%H6629><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> their trade <S%H376><s%> hath been <S%H1961><s%> to feed cattle; <S%H4735><s%> and they have brought <S%H935><s%> their flocks, <S%H6629><s%> and their herds, <S%H1241><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> they have.
And it shall come to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> shall call <S%H7121><s%> you, and shall say, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> is your occupation? <S%H4639><s%>

That ye shall say, <S%H559><s%> Thy servants' <S%H5650><s%> trade <S%H376><s%> hath been <S%H1961><s%> about cattle <S%H4735><s%> from our youth <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5271><s%> even until <S%H5704><s%> now, <S%H6258><s%> both <S%H1571><s%> we, <S%H587><s%> and also <S%H1571><s%> our fathers: <S%H1><s%> that <S%H5668><s%> ye may dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Goshen; <S%H1657><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> shepherd <S%H7462><s%> <S%H6629><s%> is an abomination <S%H8441><s%> unto the Egyptians. <S%H4714><s%>
